Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.assoc

Class DiseaseToGeneAssociationLoader

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.assoc.DiseaseToGeneAssociationLoader
public class DiseaseToGeneAssociationLoader extends Object
This class parses files containing gene to disease associations:
  1. Homo_sapiens.gene_info.gz (has links between NCBIGene ids and gene symbols)
  2. mim2gene_medgen (has links between OMIM disease ids and genes/NCBIGene ids
  3. Optionally, Orphanet's gene file, en_product6.xml (has links between Orphanet diseases and genes)

  • Method Details

    • loadDiseaseToGeneAssociations

      public static DiseaseToGeneAssociations loadDiseaseToGeneAssociations(Path mim2geneMedgen, GeneIdentifiers geneIdentifiers) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      mim2geneMedgen - path to OMIM disease to gene associations file
      geneIdentifiers - gene identifiers container
      Returns:
      a container with mappings between disease ID to GeneToAssociation.

      For instance, MICROVASCULAR COMPLICATIONS OF DIABETES, SUSCEPTIBILITY TO, 1; is associated to the gene VEGF as POLYGENIC, and MARFAN SYNDROME is associated to the gene FBN1 as MENDELIAN.

      Throws:
      IOException

    • loadDiseaseToGeneAssociations

      public static DiseaseToGeneAssociations loadDiseaseToGeneAssociations(Path mim2geneMedgen, Path orphanet2Gene, GeneIdentifiers geneIdentifiers) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      mim2geneMedgen - path to OMIM disease to gene associations file
      orphanet2Gene - path to Ophanet's gene file (ignored if null)
      geneIdentifiers - gene identifiers container
      Returns:
      a container with mappings between disease ID to GeneToAssociation.

      For instance, MICROVASCULAR COMPLICATIONS OF DIABETES, SUSCEPTIBILITY TO, 1; is associated to the gene VEGF as POLYGENIC, and MARFAN SYNDROME is associated to the gene FBN1 as MENDELIAN.

      Throws:
      IOException
